head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHIMMEL, ALLAN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHIMMEL, ALLAN M.

block.p: SCHIMMEL-Allan M. In Florida on May 27, 2000, of Massapequa LI. Beloved husband of Florence; devoted father of Elliott, Richard and Joni; loving father-in-law of Becky; cherished grandfather of David, Jennifer, Stacey, Karie and Josh. Services Tuesday, 12 noon at ''Gutterman's,'' 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, LI.
